text:
Interview to recruitment for three posts of typist-cum-stenographer will be held on the campus of the District Court shortly.

The applicants should have passed shorthand and type-writing examinations in English and Tamil.

Further details can be had by accessinghttp://ecourts.gov.in/tn/perambalurand applications should be submitted by post on or before February 5, the release added.
title: Interview to be held for three posts
